document.full_text: an australian lawmaker has demanded fifa "refunds" the a$45.6 million ($48.8 million) the country spent on its unsuccessful bid for the 2022 world cup, following the corruption scandal plaguing the global soccer governing body.
document.title: australia senator demands fifa "refunds" bid money
lines_and_colors: an australian lawmaker has demanded fifa "refunds" the a$45.6 million ($48.8 million) the country spent on its unsuccessful bid for the 2022 world cup, following the corruption scandal plaguing the global soccer governing body.
